########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND bad_sources
    ns_peak_detector_impl.cc
    ns_detector_impl.cc
    ofdm_sampler_impl.cc
    ofdm_coarse_frequency_correction_impl.cc
    ofdm_differential_demodulator_impl.cc
    frequency_deinterleaver_impl.cc
    qpsk_symbol_demapper_impl.cc
    ofdm_fine_frequency_estimation_impl.cc
    ns_moving_sum_impl.cc
    select_symbols_impl.cc
    block_departitioner_impl.cc
    depuncturing_impl.cc
    convolutional_decoder_impl.cc
    energy_dispersal_descrambler_impl.cc
    adapter_impl.cc
    ofdm_symbols_selector_impl.cc
    cus_selector_impl.cc
    time_deinterleaver_impl.cc
    fifo_sink_impl.cc
    ofdm_fine_frequency_correction_impl.cc )

set(bad_sources "${bad_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT bad_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT bad_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-bad SHARED ${bad_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-bad
    PUBLIC gnuradio-runtime gnuradio-blocks gnuradio-trellis gnuradio-digital gnuradio-analog)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-bad
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-bad PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_bad_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-bad PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-bad)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_bad_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-bad)

if(NOT test_bad_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_bad_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_bad_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("bad_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
